changeSet.createView: SELECT F_PMATERIEL.PMINV , F_PMATERIEL.PMSERIE , F_PMATERIEL.DMES , F_PMATERIEL.CODEMODELE , F_MODELES.DESIGNATIONMODELE , F_MARQUES.DESIGNATIONMARQUE , F_MARQUES.CODEMARQUE , F_MODELES.CODETE , F_TYPEEQUIP.DESIGNATIONTYPEEQUIP , F_TYPEEQUIP.TYPETE , F_PM_AFF_SCE.SISERV , F_PM_AFF_SCE.DDEBUT , F_PM_AFF_SCE.DFIN , F_PM_AFF_SCE.NOMATR FROM F_PMAFF_SC F_PM_AFF_SCE , F_PMATERIEL F_PMATERIEL , F_MARQUES F_MARQUES , F_MODELES F_MODELES , F_TYPEEQUIP F_TYPEEQUIP WHERE F_PM_AFF_SCE.PMINV = F_PMATERIEL.PMINV AND F_PM_AFF_SCE.PMINV = F_PMATERIEL.PMINV AND F_PM_AFF_SCE.PMINV = F_PMATERIEL.PMINV AND F_PM_AFF_SCE.PMINV = F_PMATERIEL.PMINV AND F_PMATERIEL.CODEMODELE = F_MODELES.CODEMODELE AND F_MARQUES.CODEMARQUE = F_MODELES.CODEMARQUE AND F_MODELES.CODETE = F_TYPEEQUIP.CODETYPEEQUIP

changeSet.createView: SELECT F_PMATERIEL.PMINV, F_PMATERIEL.PMSERIE, F_PMATERIEL.DMES, F_FPM.NUMFICHE, F_FPM.DENTREE, F_FPM.DSORTIE, F_FPM.VALIDE, F_PMPE_PERSO.CODEPMPEP, F_ENTRETIEN.LIBELLEENTRETIEN, F_PMPE_PERSO.DPREV, F_PMPE_PERSO.DREAL, F_PMPE_PERSO.DUREE, F_PMPE_PERSO.SINISTRE, F_PMPE_PERSO.COMMENTAIRE FROM F_FPM F_FPM INNER JOIN F_PMATERIEL F_PMATERIEL ON F_FPM.PMINV = F_PMATERIEL.PMINV INNER JOIN F_PMPE_PERSO F_PMPE_PERSO ON F_PMATERIEL.PMINV = F_PMPE_PERSO.PMINV INNER JOIN F_ENTRETIEN F_ENTRETIEN ON F_PMPE_PERSO.CODEENTRETIEN = F_ENTRETIEN.CODEENTRETIEN
